content: Create S3 utility functions for log operations (get-log-folders.ts, get-log-files.ts, get-log-presigned-urls.ts)
Implement backend API endpoints for admin log access (/admin/apps/:id/logs endpoints)
Create admin UI components for log viewing (LogsSection, LogFolderList, LogFileViewer)
Integrate logs section into existing app details page
Add proper error handling and loading states
Test the complete S3 logs integration end-to-end
